issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hi, I have got a problem. I was trying to submit my apps into AppStore but all of them were rejected because of crash. On my test devices everything is fine (tried both on ios 5 and ios 6 on all devices: iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4S, iPad 1, iPad 2, iPad 3).
I thought the problem was in Titanium SDK 2.1.2 so I've updated to 2.1.3 but it was useless.
Ive included crash logs hope it would be usefull.
Med (SDK 2.1.2)
http://pastebin.com/S5kTV09j
http://pastebin.com/yvdT7wwz
http://pastebin.com/bg3TLMeJ
Med (SDK 2.1.3)
http://pastebin.com/UCPXWbXX
http://pastebin.com/MUufHZpH
http://pastebin.com/2CGFwXHd
VSK (2.1.2)
http://pastebin.com/rTsTBbsQ
http://pastebin.com/F0v2zTXq
http://pastebin.com/q15KFc8x


Each time Apple said:

We found that your app crashed on iPhone 5 and iPad 3d Gen running iOS 6, which is not in compliance with the App Store Review Guidelines.
Your app crashed on both Wi-Fi and cellular networks when we:
Launch app
App crashes.

comments.body:
Full Apple's answer could be found here:
http://pastebin.com/i0wqzi5R
Could you attach symbols for the crash log?
Hi Rodion, any chance you could respond? It's an issue we'd really like to get to the bottom of. Thanks!
Please reopen if there is more information
